title: Machboos
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon curry powder, medium or hot', '3 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon paprika', '4 cardamom pods', '4 cloves', '5 black peppercorns', '1/4 tablespoon crushed dried lemon', '1 cinnamon stick, broken into a few pieces', '4 teaspoons cooking oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves fresh garlic, finely chopped', '4 fresh tomatoes, chopped', '2 chicken stock cubes', '1 whole skinned chicken, cut up', '700ml water', '390g basmati rice, washed in water a few times']
